(1) From Materials and Services provided by Headquarters on a reimbursable basis.
(2) Calculated as follows:
Class A - 23 Stations @ $600.00
Class B - 18 Stations @ 375.00
Class C - 31 Stations @ 275.00
It was estimated that the increase in fees on July 1, 1954 would result in
no decrease in Class A subscribers, a loss of three Class B stations, and a
loss of six class C stations. The following table was used as a basis for
